com.coolbitx.wallet.signing.utils

Class ScriptArgumentComposer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coolbitx.wallet.signing.utils.ScriptArgumentComposer

  • public class ScriptArgumentComposer
extends Object
    This class is designed for creating diverse script data which is used in generating script in ScriptAssembler class.
    Author:
    Hank Liu (hankliu@coolbitx.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScriptArgumentComposer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScriptData getArgument(int length)
      Get specified length argument data, and add the length to the offset of argument buffer.
      ScriptData getArgumentAll()
      Get all the rest argument buffer.
      ScriptData getArgumentRightJustified(int length)
      Get specified length argument data, if the data length is not long enough, padding zero on the left-side to the specified length.
      ScriptData getArgumentUnion(int offset, int length)
      Get specified range long argument data, and won't change the offset of argument buffer.
      ScriptData getArgumentVariableLength(int length)
      Get specified length argument data, but the actual usage length defined in BufferInt.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScriptArgumentComposer

        public ScriptArgumentComposer()

    • Method Detail

      • getArgument

        public ScriptData getArgument(int length)
        Get specified length argument data, and add the length to the offset of argument buffer.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of argument.
        Returns:
        Buffer data with fixed length.

      • getArgumentRightJustified

        public ScriptData getArgumentRightJustified(int length)
        Get specified length argument data, if the data length is not long enough, padding zero on the left-side to the specified length. Will add length to the offset of argument buffer.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of argument.
        Returns:
        Buffer data with zero padding to left-side of argument.

      • getArgumentUnion

        public ScriptData getArgumentUnion(int offset,
                                   int length)
        Get specified range long argument data, and won't change the offset of argument buffer.
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset diff from ScriptArgumentComposer offset now.
        length - The length of argument data.
        Returns:
        Buffer data with fixed length.

      • getArgumentVariableLength

        public ScriptData getArgumentVariableLength(int length)
        Get specified length argument data, but the actual usage length defined in BufferInt. Will add length to the offset of argument buffer.
        Parameters:
        length - The max length of argument.
        Returns:
        Buffer data with zero padding to left-side of argument.

      • getArgumentAll

        public ScriptData getArgumentAll()
        Get all the rest argument buffer.
        Returns:
        Buffer data with the rest argument length.
